thread.section_title: Journal Reports: Small Business News | Wall Street Journal
thread.title: As Franchising Takes Off, These Businesses Are Hottest

author: Elizabeth Garone
title: As Franchising Takes Off, These Businesses Are Hottest
text:
After a year of slowing growth, franchises are expected to come back strong in 2018, topping their recent highs for growth in a number of big measures, including revenue, new outlets and employment.
Leading the way: franchises that offer personal services.
The sector—which covers everything from education to health and veterinary care to recreation—has...
